verses.verse: וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh Then the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, unto Moses עַתָּ֣ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah Now תִרְאֶ֔ה <WH7200> tir-'Eh, Now shalt thou see אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher what אֶֽעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> 'e-'e-Seh what I will do לְפַרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> le-far-'Oh; to Pharaoh כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for בְיָ֤ד <WH3027> ve-Yad hand חֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> cha-za-Kah for with a strong יְשַׁלְּחֵ֔ם <WH7971> ye-shal-le-Chem, shall he let them go וּבְיָ֣ד <WH3027> u-ve-Yad hand חֲזָקָ֔ה <WH2389> cha-za-Kah, and with a strong יְגָרְשֵׁ֖ם <WH1644> ye-ga-re-Shem shall he drive them out מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> me-'ar-Tzo. of his land ס sa-Mek

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake אֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> E-lo-Him And God אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about מֹשֶׁ֑ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh; unto Moses וַיֹּ֥אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. unto him I [am] the LORD

וָאֵרָ֗א <WH7200> va-'e-Ra, And I appeared אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַבְרָהָ֛ם <WH85> 'av-ra-Ham unto Abraham אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to יִצְחָ֥ק <WH3327> yitz-Chak unto Isaac וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and יַעֲקֹ֖ב <WH3290> ya-'a-Ko and unto Jacob בְּאֵ֣ל <WH410> be-'El by [the name of] God שַׁדָּ֑י <WH7706> shad-Dai; Almighty וּשְׁמִ֣י <WH8034> u-she-Mi but by my name יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, JEHOVAH לֹ֥א <WH3808> lo did not נוֹדַ֖עְתִּי <WH3045> no-Da'-ti was I not known לָהֶֽם׃ la-Hem.

וְגַ֨ם <WH1571> ve-Gam also הֲקִמֹ֤תִי <WH6965> ha-ki-Mo-ti And I have also established אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִי֙ <WH1285> be-ri-Ti my covenant אִתָּ֔ם <WH854> 'it-Tam, for לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> la-Tet with them to give לָהֶ֖ם la-Hem אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz them the land כְּנָ֑עַן <WH3667> ke-Na-'an; of Canaan אֵ֛ת <WH853> 'et אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> 'E-retz the land מְגֻרֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4033> me-gu-rei-Hem of their pilgrimage אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- which גָּ֥רוּ <WH1481> Ga-ru wherein they were strangers בָֽהּ׃ Vah.

וְגַ֣ם׀ <WH1571> ve-Gam Furthermore אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I שָׁמַ֗עְתִּי <WH8085> sha-Ma'-ti, And I have also heard אֶֽת־ <WH853> 'et- נַאֲקַת֙ <WH5009> na-'a-Kat the groaning בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim the Egyptians מַעֲבִדִ֣ים <WH5647> ma-'a-vi-Dim keep in bondage אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; וָאֶזְכֹּ֖ר <WH2142> va-'ez-Kor and I have remembered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּרִיתִֽי׃ <WH1285> be-ri-Ti. my covenant

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> la-Chen Wherefore אֱמֹ֥ר <WH559> 'e-Mor say לִבְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> liv-nei- unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֮ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel אֲנִ֣י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> Yah-weh I [am] the LORD וְהוֹצֵאתִ֣י <WH3318> ve-ho-tze-Ti and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֗ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, מִתַּ֙חַת֙ <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat under סִבְלֹ֣ת <WH5450> siv-Lot you out from under the burdens מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim, of the Egyptians וְהִצַּלְתִּ֥י <WH5337> ve-hitz-tzal-Ti and I will rid אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> 'et-Chem מֵעֲבֹדָתָ֑ם <WH5656> me-'a-vo-da-Tam; you out of their bondage וְגָאַלְתִּ֤י <WH1350> ve-ga-'al-Ti and I will redeem אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem בִּזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> biz-Ro-a' out arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> ne-tu-Yah, you with a stretched וּבִשְׁפָטִ֖ים <WH8201> u-vish-fa-Tim judgments גְּדֹלִֽים׃ <WH1419> ge-do-Lim. and with great

וְלָקַחְתִּ֨י <WH3947> ve-la-kach-Ti And I will take אֶתְכֶ֥ם <WH853> 'et-Chem לִי֙ li לְעָ֔ם <WH5971> le-'Am, you to me for a people וְהָיִ֥יתִי <WH1961> ve-ha-Yi-ti become לָכֶ֖ם la-Chem לֵֽאלֹהִ֑ים <WH430> le-lo-Him; and I will be to you a God וִֽידַעְתֶּ֗ם <WH3045> vi-da'-Tem, and ye shall know כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki that אֲנִ֤י <WH589> 'a-Ni I am יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹ֣הֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> 'e-Lo-hei-Chem, your God הַמּוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> ham-mo-Tzi which bringeth אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> 'et-Chem, מִתַּ֖חַת <WH8478> mit-Ta-chat under סִבְל֥וֹת <WH5450> siv-Lot you out from under the burdens מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of the Egyptians

וְהֵבֵאתִ֤י <WH935> ve-he-ve-Ti And I will bring אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> 'et-Chem אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, you in unto the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> 'a-Sher which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <WH5375> na-Sa-ti accept אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יָדִ֔י <WH3027> ya-Di, able לָתֵ֣ת <WH5414> la-Tet to give אֹתָ֔הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah, לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <WH85> le-'av-ra-Ham it to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <WH3327> le-yitz-Chak to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹ֑ב <WH3290> u-le-ya-'a-Ko; and to Jacob וְנָתַתִּ֨י <WH5414> ve-na-tat-Ti and I will give אֹתָ֥הּ <WH853> 'o-Tah לָכֶ֛ם la-Chem מוֹרָשָׁ֖ה <WH4181> mo-ra-Shah it you for an heritage אֲנִ֥י <WH589> 'a-Ni I יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. I [am] the LORD

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֛ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh And Moses כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> ken thus אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei so unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El; of Israel וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> ve-Lo did not שָֽׁמְעוּ֙ <WH8085> sha-me-'U but they hearkened אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, not unto Moses מִקֹּ֣צֶר <WH7115> mik-Ko-tzer for anguish ר֔וּחַ <WH7307> Ru-ach, of spirit וּמֵעֲבֹדָ֖ה <WH5656> u-me-'a-vo-Dah bondage קָשָֽׁה׃ <WH7186> ka-Shah. and for cruel פ Peh
וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

בֹּ֣א <WH935> bo Go דַבֵּ֔ר <WH1696> dab-Ber, in speak אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- about פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt וִֽישַׁלַּ֥ח <WH7971> vi-shal-Lach go out אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- that he let the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאַרְצֽוֹ׃ <WH776> me-'ar-Tzo. of his land

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh, And Moses לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying הֵ֤ן <WH2005> hen Behold בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- Behold the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel לֹֽא־ <WH3808> lo- have not שָׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> sha-me-'U have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <WH413> 'e-Lai, to me וְאֵיךְ֙ <WH349> ve-'eiCh how יִשְׁמָעֵ֣נִי <WH8085> yish-ma-'E-ni hear פַרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> far-'Oh, unto me how then shall Pharaoh וַאֲנִ֖י <WH589> va-'a-Ni me עֲרַ֥ל <WH6189> 'a-Ral who [am] of uncircumcised שְׂפָתָֽיִם׃ <WH8193> se-fa-Ta-yim. band פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָה֮ <WH3068> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> mo-Sheh unto Moses וְאֶֽל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to אַהֲרֹן֒ <WH175> 'a-ha-Ron and unto Aaron וַיְצַוֵּם֙ <WH6680> vay-tzav-Vem and gave them a charge אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> be-Nei unto the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and to פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> par-'Oh and unto Pharaoh מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> Me-lech king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim; of Egypt לְהוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> le-ho-Tzi to bring אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt ס sa-Mek

אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh These רָאשֵׁ֣י <WH7218> ra-Shei These [be] the heads בֵית־ <WH1004> veit- houses אֲבֹתָ֑ם <WH1> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers' בְּנֵ֨י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons רְאוּבֵ֜ן <WH7205> re-'u-Ven of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <WH1060> be-Chor the firstborn יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel חֲנ֤וֹךְ <WH2585> cha-Noch Hanoch וּפַלּוּא֙ <WH6396> u-fal-Lu and Pallu חֶצְר֣וֹן <WH2696> chetz-Ron Hezron וְכַרְמִ֔י <WH3756> ve-char-Mi, and Carmi אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot these [be] the families רְאוּבֵֽן׃ <WH7205> re-'u-Ven. of Reuben

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons שִׁמְע֗וֹן <WH8095> shim-'on, of Simeon יְמוּאֵ֨ל <WH3223> ye-mu-'El Jemuel וְיָמִ֤ין <WH3226> ve-ya-Min and Jamin וְאֹ֙הַד֙ <WH161> ve-'O-had and Ohad וְיָכִ֣ין <WH3199> ve-ya-Chin and Jachin וְצֹ֔חַר <WH6714> ve-Tzo-char, and Zohar וְשָׁא֖וּל <WH7586> ve-sha-'Ul and Shaul בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son הַֽכְּנַעֲנִ֑ית <WH3669> hak-ke-na-'a-Nit; of a Canaanitish woman אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> 'El-leh these מִשְׁפְּחֹ֥ת <WH4940> mish-pe-Chot these [are] the families שִׁמְעֽוֹן׃ <WH8095> shim-'on. of Simeon

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֤וֹת <WH8034> she-Mot And these [are] the names בְּנֵֽי־ <WH1121> be-nei- of the sons לֵוִי֙ <WH3878> le-Vi of Levi לְתֹ֣לְדֹתָ֔ם <WH8435> le-To-le-do-Tam, according to their generations גֵּרְשׁ֕וֹן <WH1648> ge-re-Shon Gershon וּקְהָ֖ת <WH6955> u-ke-Hat and Kohath וּמְרָרִ֑י <WH4847> u-me-ra-Ri; and Merari וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> u-she-Nei and the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> chai-Yei of the life לֵוִ֔י <WH3878> le-Vi, of Levi שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> She-va' and seven וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> u-me-'At [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years

בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei The sons גֵרְשׁ֛וֹן <WH1648> ge-re-Shon of Gershon לִבְנִ֥י <WH3845> liv-Ni Libni וְשִׁמְעִ֖י <WH8096> ve-shim-'I and Shimi לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָֽם׃ <WH4940> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam. according to their families

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> u-ve-Nei And the sons קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> ke-Hat, of Kohath עַמְרָ֣ם <WH6019> 'am-Ram Amram וְיִצְהָ֔ר <WH3324> ve-yitz-Har, and Izhar וְחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> ve-chev-Ron and Hebron וְעֻזִּיאֵ֑ל <WH5816> ve-'uz-zi-'El; and Uzziel וּשְׁנֵי֙ <WH8141> u-she-Nei and the years חַיֵּ֣י <WH2416> chai-Yei of the life קְהָ֔ת <WH6955> ke-Hat, of Kohath שָׁלֹ֧שׁ <WH7969> sha-Losh and three וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֛ים <WH7970> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וּמְאַ֖ת <WH3967> u-me-'At [were] an hundred שָׁנָֽה׃ <WH8141> sha-Nah. years
